reviews.review_msg: Loved Evan!! He was extremely passionate, which made the subject all the more interesting. He posts assigned readings for the objects you learn about, but as long as you pay attention & take notes during lectures, you don't need to read anything. Slides are posted, have accompanying study questions, & the online quizzes are straightforward.
Very nice and lectures were always well done and engaging, you can tell he cared about the material a lot and was always excited to teach. Was easily one of my favourite courses. :)
